info.title: LMS BPSDM MALUT API Documentation
info.description: API documentation for LMS BPSDM MALUT module

get.description: Returns paginated list of all admins and instructors

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term to filter results (searches username, email, nama_lengkap and nip)

post.description: Create a new admin or instructor account (Super Admin only)

message.example: Unauthorized. Only Super Admin can create new admin/instruktur.

get.summary: Get admin or instructor by ID
get.description: Returns specific admin or instructor details

put.description: Update admin or instructor information (Super Admin can update any account, regular admin can only update their own)

nama_dengan_gelar.example: Prof. Dr. Updated Instructor Name, M.Pd, Ph.D

message.example: Unauthorized. You can only update your own account.

delete.description: Delete admin or instructor account (Super Admin only)

message.example: Unauthorized. Only Super Admin can delete admin/instruktur.

422.description: Cannot delete the last Super Admin

message.example: Cannot delete the last Super Admin account.

post.description: Logout and revoke current access token
